[Home](./index.md) &gt; [bitburner](./bitburner.md) &gt; [Port](./bitburner.port.md)

## Port interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Port 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [clear()](./bitburner.port.clear.md) | Remove all data from the port |
|  [empty()](./bitburner.port.empty.md) | True if the port has no data |
|  [full()](./bitburner.port.full.md) | True if the port is at capacity |
|  [peek()](./bitburner.port.peek.md) | Peek at the data at the front of the port, leaving it on the port |
|  [read()](./bitburner.port.read.md) | Read the data at the front of the port, removing it from the port |
|  [tryWrite(value)](./bitburner.port.trywrite.md) | Write data to the port, failing if the port is full. |
|  [write(value)](./bitburner.port.write.md) | Write data to the port, making room if the port is full. |
